help.title: Help
help.intro: How to use the Cash Flow application
help.step1: Enter your initial balance, total income and expenses
help.step2: Select start and end dates for the projection
help.step3: Add income or expense events by clicking on the calendar
help.step4: The projection is calculated automatically when any data changes
help.step5: Green color indicates positive balance, red indicates negative

meta.title: Finna - Personal Loans
meta.description: Fast and easy personal loans. Get a quote in minutes and receive the money in less than 24 hours.

hero.title: Personal loans tailored to your needs
hero.subtitle: Get an instant quote and receive the money in less than 24 hours.

cases.title: Why choose Finna?
cases.subtitle: Thousands of people have already trusted us to solve their financial needs.

features.title: Finna Advantages
features.description: We offer quick and accessible financial solutions to meet your needs

items.title: 100% Digital Process
items.description: Apply for your loan from any device, without paperwork or branch visits.

items.title: Fast Approval
items.description: Evaluation and response in minutes, with money disbursement in less than 24 hours.

items.title: No Guarantees
items.description: You don't need to present guarantors or properties as collateral to access your loan.

items.title: Competitive Rates
items.description: We offer transparent and competitive financial conditions tailored to your profile.

items.title: Flexible Amounts
items.description: Request from small loans to larger amounts according to your particular needs.

items.title: Personalized Attention
items.description: We have specialized advisors to help you every step of the way.

stats.title: Our Process
stats.description: Get your loan in 3 simple steps

process.title: Quote
process.description: Fill out the form with your information and the amount you need to receive a personalized quote.

process.title: Verification
process.description: Our system will analyze your application and immediately inform you about the approval of your loan.

process.title: Disbursement
process.description: Once approved, you'll receive the money in less than 24 hours.

testimonials.title: Customer Experiences
testimonials.description: What people who have already obtained loans with Finna say

items.title: Saved me in an emergency
items.description: I needed money urgently to fix my car and in less than a day I already had the money in my account. A great solution when you're in a hurry. The process was super simple.

items.title: Straightforward loan
items.description: After several banks gave me the runaround with thousands of requirements, Finna approved a loan for me quickly and with better conditions. Zero bureaucracy, all digital. Really amazing.

items.title: Excellent interest rate
items.description: I compared everywhere and Finna offered me the best rate. I requested the loan to remodel my apartment and the entire process was very transparent. I ended up paying exactly what they told me from the beginning.

items.title: Personalized attention
items.description: What I liked most was the attention via WhatsApp. I had questions about the process and they answered me right away. No waiting on the phone for hours like with traditional banks. Highly recommended!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We resolve your doubts about personal loans and the application process.
faq.contactDescription: If you didn't find the answer to your question, our team of financial advisors is ready to help you.

items.question: What are the requirements to apply for a loan?
items.answer: To apply for a loan with Finna you need: to be of legal age, have an ID or legal residence, and have an income.

items.question: How long does it take to receive the money?
items.answer: Once your application is approved, you will receive the money within a maximum of 24 business hours, although most of our clients receive it in just a few hours.

items.question: What interest rates do you handle?
items.answer: Our interest rates vary according to the applicant's profile and the required amount. You can find out your personalized rate using our online calculator without any commitment.

items.question: Can I pay off my loan early?
items.answer: Absolutely! With Finna you can pay off your loan before the established term without any penalty. By doing so, you will only pay the interest corresponding to the time you used the money.

cta.title: Get the money you need today
